name: Vairina Valiente
effect: [overDress]－"Trickstar", or a grade 3 or less unit in the [overDress] state (You may place it by stacking it on the specified unit instead of normal calling it to (RC))[CONT](RC):This unit gets [Power] +5000 for each of this unit's originalDress. [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When the attack of this unit in the [overDress] state hits, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], and [Stand] this unit.
flavor: Prayers have the power to change the world.

name: Heavy Artillery of Dust Storm, Eugene
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][[Rest] two rear-guards], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:If your opponent's rear-guard was retired this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 5], look at the same number of cards from the top of your deck as the number of your opponent's open (RC), choose any number of unit cards from among them, call them to (RC), and put the rest into your soul.
flavor: You can do as you wish after this. It will not affect our victory

name: Master of Gravity, Baromagnes
effect: [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and perform all of the following according to the number of cards in your soul. ・5 or more ‐ Draw a card. ・10 or more ‐ This unit gets [Power] +10000/[Critical] +1 until end of that battle. ・15 or more ‐ Both you and your opponent put all of your own rear-guards into your souls. Choose up to two cards from your soul, call them to (RC), and those units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Until either side falls! That's what battle is, right?

name: Diabolos Boys, Eden
effect: [CONT](RC):If you are in "Final Rush", this unit gets [Power] +5000, and if this unit [Stand] this turn by a card effect, [Critical] +1.[AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: I too, am a point-getter of the team!

name: Cardinal Deus, Orfist
effect: [CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if your World is Dark Night or Abyssal Dark Night, this unit gets [Power] +5000. [ACT](VC):If your World is Abyssal Dark Night, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], and call up to three Shadow Army tokens to (RC). (Your World changes when you play a specific order. Shadow Army has [Power] 15000 and Boost)
flavor: They leave their blades unsheathed. In anticipation of the next duel to the death.

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Agra Rouge
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If two or more of your opponent's cards are imprisoned in your Prison, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +10000. [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and imprison it in your Prison. (Put them into your Order Zone that has a Prison)
flavor: You have no chance of winning. If you want to surrender, do it fast.

name: Grand Heavenly Sword, Alden
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 2] &[Soul-Blast 1], choose a card from your hand, and call it to (RC). If you called a grade 3, draw two cards.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have three or more grade 3 units, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Standing on par with the strongest blade. As though lauding their noble justice.

name: Hexaorb Sorceress
effect: [AUTO](VC):When your drive check reveals a trigger unit, choose one of your rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:If you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1] &[Soul-Blast 1], reveal up to one [Critical] trigger or [Front] trigger from your hand and put it on the top of your deck, and this unit gets drive +1 until end of turn.
flavor: A new revelation slumbers within the forms that are already known.

name: Mysterious Rain Spiritualist, Zorga
effect: [CONT](VC):When you would play a normal order, you can bind a normal order with a different card name from your drop, and Alchemagic. (Combine the costs, and add the effect to the back!)[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a card from your drop zone, and call it to (RC).
flavor: Yes, show it to me. That which you call your way of life.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Giunosla
effect: [AUTO]Back Row (RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1],choose one of your other rear-guards, and it gets this unit's [Power] until end of turn. (Increase by its [Power] at that time)
flavor: The scholarly beasts do not shy away from cooperation.

name: Vairina Arcs
effect: [overDress]－"Trickstar" (You may place it by stacking it on the specified unit instead of normal calling it to (RC))[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if it [overDress], [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw two cards, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Limitless potential. Capable of taking on any form.

name: Stealth Dragon, Tensha Stead
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack this unit boosted hits, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire this unit], choose one of your vanguards, search your deck for up to one card with the same card name as that card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: A split-second replacement. The changed appearance misleads everyone.

name: Dragon Deity King of Resurgence, Dragveda
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - Choose one of your vanguards, and [Stand] it!
flavor: Stand up. Never giving up is the way to open the path forward.

name: Upward Acrobat, Marjorie
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks, If you are in "Final Rush", [COST][put one of your other rear-guards into your soul], draw a card, [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: This is tonight's climax! Be dazzled, Acrobat Maximum!

name: Steam Battler, Gungnram
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [Soul-Charge 1]. [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 3], and draw a card.
flavor: Your very existence will be erased. We can't leave any trace of you in history after all.

name: Hades Dragon Deity of Resentment, Gallmageheld
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - You get "During your turn, all of your vanguards get [Power] +10000/[Critical] +1" until end of this fight!
flavor: Once resentment is planted, it will remain across eras as the root of evil.

name: Hyperspeed Robo, Chevalstud
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and imprison it in your Prison. Then, if three or more of your opponent's cards are imprisoned in your Prison, you draw a card.
flavor: Hold up! This is the Cosmo Security!

name: Detonation Monster, Bobalmine
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if your Order Zone has a Set Order, [COST][put this unit into your soul], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: Research on how to make good use of blast waves is ongoing.

name: Star Dragon Deity of Infinitude, Eldobreath
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - Double the [Power] and [Critical] of all of your front row units until end of turn! (Increase to double its [Power] and [Critical] when activated)
flavor: It is renowned throughout space. For how it has taken hold of unlimited power.

name: Knight of War Damage, Fosado
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects.[AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, [Counter-Charge 1]/[Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: Resist no matter what. There is a chance of victory in adversity.

name: Painkiller Angel
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire this unit], and draw a card.
flavor: There's no need to worry. It'll be over after a small prick.

name: Light Dragon Deity of Honors, Amartinoa
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - Until end of turn, you also perform drive checks for the battles your rear-guards attack!
flavor: Rouse yourself with courage. Everyone has the capability to be a hero.

name: Inheritance Maiden, Hendrina
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), you may discard three cards from the top of your deck.[ACT](RC):[COST][Retire this unit], and until end of turn, the next time you would Alchemagic an order and play it, you may choose not to pay all of that cost's [Soul-Blast].
flavor: The Wise Cube is a treasured tool that measures divine protection.

name: Spurring Maiden, Ellenia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1] &[Soul-Blast 1], choose a grade 2 or less card from your drop, call it to (RC), and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The nation where the land and sea become one. That is Stoicheia.

name: Source Dragon Deity of Blessings, Blessfavor
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - Draw a card! Choose one of your units, and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn! All of your front row units get [Power] +10000! If your damage zone has the same number of cards as your opponent's or more, choose a card from your damage zone, and heal it!
flavor: Nature. Its bounty is countless, its wonders immeasurable.

name: Penetrate Dragon, Tribash
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard attacks, if your opponent has two or less rear-guards, [COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of that battle.
flavor: Dinodragons instinctively cooperate with each other.

name: Cataclysmic Bullet of Dust Storm, Randor
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Heavy Artillery of Dust Storm, Eugene", draw a card, choose up to one card from your drop, and put it into your soul.[AUTO](VC/RC):When this unit attacks, if your opponent has two or less rear-guards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Reduce their pawns with certainty. Eventually the enemy will be checkmated.

name: Dragritter, Dabbaax
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 2], [Soul-Charge 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: Wanna try touching? Only if you're prepared to turn into ash, that is.

name: Stealth Rogue of Strife, Fudoumaru
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and draw a card.
flavor: A beating alone won't settle things. So, what are you gonna do about it?

name: Dragritter, Alwalith
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's grade 2 or greater rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: Target spotted! This one's mine, alright?

name: Twin Buckler Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: Thunder and flames. Wield them both skillfuly and repel the calamity.

name: Phantasma Magician, Curtis
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your vanguard is "Master of Gravity, Baromagnes", [Soul-Charge 2]. [ACT](RC):If your soul has ten or more cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], and all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: With the restoration of the world, the circus bustled with activities for days.

name: Electro Spartan
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Master of Gravity, Baromagnes", [COST][put a card from your hand into your soul], draw a card, and [Soul-Charge 1]. [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Soul-Charge 2].
flavor: Voltage: maximum. Electrification: lethal.

name: Shadow Leak Magician
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects.
flavor: Pretend you didn't see anything! It’s a promise with big sister, okay!

name: Protobulb Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks or boosts, if you are in "Final Rush", [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put another rear-guard into your soul], choose a card from your soul, and put it into your hand.
flavor: It will be needed someday. And the dragon knows it.

name: Recusal Hate Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: Ideals alone are meaningless. Justice without power has no worth.

name: Crawl, you "Insects"!
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]![Soul-Charge 1]. Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn for every five cards in your soul. If your soul has ten or more cards, draw a card.
flavor: Stand atop the stage that is the battlefield. Even so, the weak cannot triumph.

name: Granaroad Fairtigar
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn. Choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and imprison it in your Prison. (Put them into your Order Zone that has a Prison)
flavor: From the legend of the Blue Warrior, the Crimson Gladiator was born.

name: Cardinal Noid, Cubisia
effect: [AUTO](VC):When a World is put into your order zone, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[CONT](RC):During your turn, if your World is Abyssal Dark Night, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: The "cardinals" continues to guard the world through the nights where hope has collapsed.

name: Polar Cold Monster, Drumler
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), If your World is Abyssal Dark Night, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and draw a card.
flavor: The increase in polar cold monsters could be said to be the cause of the Ice Age.

name: Fighting Dragon, Goldog Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your turn, if you have a Set Order in your Order Zone, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and call this card to (RC).
flavor: Crossing the stars to arrive. In order to meet new strong opponents.

name: Violate Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: It instinctively rejects the foreign object.

name: Hollowing Moonlit Night
effect: (After a set order is played, put it into your Order Zone.)Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1]![AUTO]:When this card is put into order zone, draw a card. [CONT]Order Zone:If your order zone only has World cards, the following effects are active according to the number of cards in your order zone.・1 card ‐ Your World becomes Dark Night.・2 or more cards ‐ Your World becomes Abyssal Dark Night.
flavor: The night is arriving. The night that is the void that will destroy the world.

name: Dark Strain Dragon
effect: [ACT](RC):If you have three or more grade 3 units, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and all of your grade 3 units get "Boost" until end of turn.
flavor: Its overwhelming power surged as it approached.

name: Big Snake Witch, Solaria
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and draw a card.
flavor: Your wish is for power? If so, say it honestly.

name: Pentagleam Sorceress
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Hexaorb Sorceress", look at three cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or bottom of your deck. If you put it on the bottom of your deck, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Do not fear the unknown. Have faith in the courage you hold.

name: Divine Sister, Tartine
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Rest] this unit], look at two cards from the top of your deck, choose one card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: Its sense to isolate targets stands out even among the Sisters.

name: Divine Sister, Faciata
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your drive check reveals a trigger unit, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: The cheerful Sister is beloved by even the people of the land.

name: Aegismare Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: This pain… I shall take on all of it.

name: Black Tears Husk Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), choose up to one normal order from your drop, and put it into your hand. [CONT](RC):If you played an order this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Tears flowed from the black dragon. Tears of crazed joy stemming from pity.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Agleo
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Retire this unit], choose two of your units, and they get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Long ago, the land and sea had lost their powers during the era without prayers.

name: Planar Prevent Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: I'll definitely protect them. They are lives that finally sprouted after all.

name: Cursed Souls Squirming in Agony
effect: Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 2]!Look at four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one unit card from among them, call it to (RC), and discard the rest. If during Alchemagic, call up to two cards instead of one to (RC), and all of this order's called units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: I'll lend you a hand. Don't worry, no need for thanks.

name: Grief, Despair, and Rejection
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!If your vanguard is "Mysterious Rain Spiritualist, Zorga", choose three of your units, and they get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Negative emotions; as they waver, it learns of joy.

name: Spiritual Body Condensation
effect: Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1]!Choose a card with grade equal to or less than your vanguard from your drop, call it to (RC), and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: O wandering souls, I shall grant you a new purpose for existence.

name: Stealth Dragon, Hadou Shugen
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a unit in the [overDress] state, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: Not enough training. Go and start over from before you were born!

name: Stealth Rogue of Iron Blade, Oshikuni
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your opponent has two or less rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: If it's just this number, ol' me can clear it up alone.

name: Dragritter, Zafar
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit intercepts, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Shield] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: pologies, I can't let you just pass like that.

name: Extremist Dragon, Velocihazard
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: It noticed you. That is its only reason for attacking.

name: Gunning of Dust Storm, Nigel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Cataclysmic Bullet of Dust Storm, Randor", [Soul-Charge 1]. [AUTO](RC):When your opponent's rear-guard is retired during your main phase, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire this unit], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: Crush your enemies when you can. No need for hesitation.

name: Stealth Fiend, Shigamanago
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your opponent's rear-guard is retired during your main phase, [COST][retire this unit], look at the top card of your deck, and you may call a unit card from among them to (RC). If you did not call, put the rest into your soul.
flavor: My loved ones are long gone. Not even regrets are left.

name: Double Gun of Dust Storm, Bart
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: My beloved guns can breathe fire!

name: Conduct Spark Dragon
flavor: Gathering electricity within itself, it prepares to strike its resented foe.

name: Rushing Dragon, Steel Dilopho
flavor: I'm famished. Where's the prey?

name: Stealth Dragon, Jaengoku
flavor: Be burnt to cinders!

name: White Light Dragon, Parasolace
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: Babies are bundles of life energy. Even more so for Dinodragon babies.

name: Sunlight Punishment
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast one or more cards]!Choose one of your opponent's rear-guards for each [Counter-Blast] paid for this cost, and retire it.
flavor: Sunlight banishes the night, and shines the way forth to the hope beyond.

name: Burn Bright, Pure Prayers
effect: If your damage zone has three or more cards, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Until the wishes reach the heavens, the "Blaze Maidens" continue to pray.

name: Selfish Engraver
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, [Soul-Charge 1]. [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if your soul has ten or more cards, [COST][put this unit into your soul], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: Hey! Stop moving around while it's hardening!

name: Soulful Wildmaster, Megan
effect: [CONT](RC):If you [Soul-Charge] this turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000.
flavor: No matter the era, the masses are wont to seek panem et circenses.

name: Eminence Jaboberus
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: You can somewhat feel elegance from the act… I think.

name: Steam Artist, Pithana
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Put this unit into your soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: That song is passed on to future generations without fading.

name: Steam Detective, Uvaritt
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose one of your other units in the same column as this unit, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn. If you are in "Final Rush", it gets [Power] +5000 instead of +2000.
flavor: Entering the labyrinth? That's my cue!

name: Direful Doll, Simone
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if your soul has five or more cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and until end of that battle, when your opponent would call cards from their hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time.
flavor: Elder sister talked about this. How it is dangerous to be alone.

name: Deep Soniker
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), [Soul-Charge 1]. [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your soul has ten or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: The overlapping sharp blades of wind. Anyone who touches it is immediately split into two.

name: Uncanny Burning
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Who is the one that wished to be burnt?

name: Flinty Slasher
flavor: All limbs can become weapon. In other words, an additional strike from here.

name: Vital Leaver
flavor: I'll use your share for you!

name: Huckle Hustle
flavor: All that it touches gets mangled.

name: Steam Scara, Mal-Nigal
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: I'm mixing up a new medicine! Its effect will also be outstanding!

name: Tartaros Beatscram
effect: If your soul has five or more cards, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: This is a scrummage of hell. And this is your one-way ticket.

name: Lightning Thief Monster, Jabattail
effect: [CONT](RC):If your World is Abyssal Dark Night, when this unit would attack, it battles all of the units in one of your opponent's columns.
flavor: Casualties from monster attacks are still common, and ensuring safety proves to be difficult.

name: Grapple External
effect: [CONT](RC):During the battle this unit attacks, if an opponent's card is imprisoned in your Prison, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: It is now the "Nova Grapple New Era". A ruthless competition among the strongest martial artists!

name: Cardinal Noid, Routis
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), search your deck for up to one World card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[CONT](RC):During the battle this unit attacked or boosted, if your World is Dark Night or Abyssal Dark Night, this unit gets [Power] +2000.
flavor: The tetrahedral mechanical weapons "coffin" has the power to warp causality.

name: Electrode Monster, Adapton
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Drawing power from the lands. Without permission, of course.

name: Useful Recharger
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and if your World is Dark Night, this unit gets [Shield] +5000 until end of turn. If it is Abyssal Dark Night, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Superfast charging, service available here!

name: Cardinal Fang, Phovi
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Those who manipulate "coffins" to fight. They are "cardinals".

name: Cardinal Draco, Barbizonde
flavor: "Cardinals" change their appearance to match the quirks of their "coffin".

name: Cardinal Fang, Fulgrus
flavor: Records and teachings from the era without prayers were all lost.

name: Cardinal Draco, Aeblood
flavor: The era without prayers is a reference to the night of the world after the deities vanished.

name: Cardinal Prima, Nabilem
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: The history before the era without prayers are spoken as myths.

name: Causality Goes Crazy as I Will It
effect: Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1]!Choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Analyzing unknown powers, and utilize them as weapons to defend the world.

name: Lightning Barrier, Emergency Deployment!
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 2]!Choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +30000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Red alert! Defenders, emergency dispatch!

name: In the Darkness Nobody Knows
effect: (After a set order is played, put it into your Order Zone.)Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1]![AUTO]:When this card is put in the order zone, choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and retire it. [CONT]Order Zone:If your order zone only has World cards, the following effects are active according to the number of cards in your order zone.・1 card ‐ Your World becomes Dark Night.・2 or more cards ‐ Your World becomes Abyssal Dark Night.
flavor: In the darkness where even the moon cannot be seen, catastrophe approached from beyond the world.

name: Actual Analyst, Kokabiel
effect: [CONT](GC):If your vanguard is "Apex Ruler, Bastion", this unit gets [Shield] +5000 for every two of your grade 3 units. (Including this unit)
flavor: Ascertain the necessities, and swiftly make preparations.

name: Divine Sister, Lepisto
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your drive check reveals a trigger unit, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], [Stand] this unit, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Still around~? Hurry up and disappear~!

name: Remission Sword, Phanuel
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have three or more grade 3 units, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], and this unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of that battle.
flavor: Be it patients from the skies or injured from the ground, I'll be sure to heal them all.

name: Divine Sister, Pastelitos
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your drive check reveals a trigger unit, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: I know! That this will hit for sure!

name: Tier Square Sorceress
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Pentagleam Sorceress", [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card. [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your drive check reveals a trigger unit, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and put it on the bottom of their deck.
flavor: One by one, build it up without rushing.

name: Knight of Heavenly Wind, Vachel
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: This wind shall surely bring forth our victory!

name: Tri Connect Sorceress
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: If it is us, we can surely build a bright future!

name: White Fang Witch, Disma
flavor: And now, which one shall go first~?

name: Exalting Knight, Eafred
flavor: For the sakes of the oppressed citizens, the golden knight heads to the frontlines.

name: White Crow Sorcerer, Taxus
flavor: Its impossible, you say? Who are you to determine that?

name: Circuling Sorceress
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: The Keter Engine is said to be completed by the magi.

name: Downswing of Sword of Judgement
effect: Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1 grade 3]!Choose one of your opponent's rear-guards. Your opponent puts all of their rear-guards in the same column as that rear-guard on the bottom of their deck.
flavor: The mystical powers dwell in the sword. Hence this is a holy judgement acknowledged by the deities.

name: Hopeful Testode
effect: If you have three or more units, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Knights, fear nothing and press forth!

name: Astute Noble, Edgar
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The thoughts of the sages gathered approvals, on which Stoicheia was built.

name: Hydrolic Ram Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if your bind zone has an order card, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: By tightening the nozzle, a much higher water pressure is achieved.

name: Dark Pilgrimage
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: I'll be your guide within the ship. No idea where we are currently though.

name: Rancor Chain
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], draw two cards, choose up to one order card from your hand, discard it, and if you did not discard, choose two cards from your hand, and discard them.[CONT](RC):If you played an order this turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000.
flavor: They are the monsters from folktales. Hidden in fantasies, they tempt feelings of people.

name: Conspiring Mutant, Admantis
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose one of your other rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: I'll end you myself. Only as a last resort.

name: Dream Nibbling
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: In the storm of pure darkness, they suddenly appeared.

name: Abyss Temptation
flavor: Even if it’s a battleship, there's no way to resist once it is caught.

name: Lost Child of Attachment
flavor: A fictional character for the purpose of admonition. Fictional up until yesterday, that is.

name: Grudgeful Hatchet
flavor: Those with regrets left in this world become servants aboard Regrain.

name: Elegy Pixy
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: Why have they appeared. The truth behind it has not been answered.

name: Tearful Malice
effect: Play this with [COST][retire two rear-guards]!Draw a card, put this card into your soul, and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: I don't mind dying. As long as that is killed.

name: Ghost Chase
effect: Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. Choose one of your rear-guards not being attacked, and return it to your hand.
flavor: The place it got cornered at was the usual haunt of evil spirits.

name: Sealed Path
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 2]!Choose one of your opponent's vanguards, and that unit gets [Critical] -1 until end of that battle.
flavor: A dead-end filled with despair, that no one can leave.

name: Trickstar
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects.

name: Chakrabarthi Divine Dragon, Nirvana
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a card from your hand], choose a grade 0 card from your drop, and call it to (RC). [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit and all of your units with the [overDress] ability get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Penetrate Dragon, Tribash
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard attacks, if your opponent has two or less rear-guards, [COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of that battle.

name: Cataclysmic Bullet of Dust Storm, Randor
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Heavy Artillery of Dust Storm, Eugene", draw a card, choose up to one card from your drop, and put it into your soul.[AUTO](VC/RC):When this unit attacks, if your opponent has two or less rear-guards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.

name: Twin Buckler Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.

name: Gunning of Dust Storm, Nigel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Cataclysmic Bullet of Dust Storm, Randor", [Soul-Charge 1]. [AUTO](RC):When your opponent's rear-guard is retired during your main phase, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire this unit], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.

name: Stealth Fiend, Shigamanago
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your opponent's rear-guard is retired during your main phase, [COST][retire this unit], look at the top card of your deck, and you may call a unit card from among them to (RC). If you did not call, put the rest into your soul.

name: Double Gun of Dust Storm, Bart
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: Electro Spartan
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Master of Gravity, Baromagnes", [COST][put a card from your hand into your soul], draw a card, and [Soul-Charge 1]. [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Soul-Charge 2].

name: Recusal Hate Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.

name: Crawl, you "Insects"!
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]![Soul-Charge 1]. Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn for every five cards in your soul. If your soul has ten or more cards, draw a card.

name: Selfish Engraver
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, [Soul-Charge 1]. [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if your soul has ten or more cards, [COST][put this unit into your soul], and [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Deep Soniker
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), [Soul-Charge 1]. [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your soul has ten or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +10000.

name: Uncanny Burning
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: Cardinal Noid, Cubisia
effect: [AUTO](VC):When a World is put into your order zone, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[CONT](RC):During your turn, if your World is Abyssal Dark Night, this unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Violate Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.

name: Hollowing Moonlit Night
effect: Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1]![AUTO]:When this card is put into order zone, draw a card. [CONT]Order Zone:If your order zone only has World cards, the following effects are active according to the number of cards in your order zone.・1 card ‐ Your World becomes Dark Night.・2 or more cards ‐ Your World becomes Abyssal Dark Night.

name: Cardinal Noid, Routis
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), search your deck for up to one World card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[CONT](RC):During the battle this unit attacked or boosted, if your World is Dark Night or Abyssal Dark Night, this unit gets [Power] +2000.

name: Cardinal Fang, Phovi
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: In the Darkness Nobody Knows
effect: Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1]![AUTO]:When this card is put in the order zone, choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and retire it. [CONT]Order Zone:If your order zone only has World cards, the following effects are active according to the number of cards in your order zone.・1 card ‐ Your World becomes Dark Night.・2 or more cards ‐ Your World becomes Abyssal Dark Night.

name: Dark Strain Dragon
effect: [ACT](RC):If you have three or more grade 3 units, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and all of your grade 3 units get "Boost" until end of turn.

name: Pentagleam Sorceress
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Hexaorb Sorceress", look at three cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or bottom of your deck. If you put it on the bottom of your deck, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.

name: Divine Sister, Tartine
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Rest] this unit], look at two cards from the top of your deck, choose one card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Aegismare Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.

name: Tier Square Sorceress
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Pentagleam Sorceress", [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card. [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your drive check reveals a trigger unit, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and put it on the bottom of their deck.

name: Tri Connect Sorceress
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: Black Tears Husk Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), choose up to one normal order from your drop, and put it into your hand. [CONT](RC):If you played an order this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Planar Prevent Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.

name: Grief, Despair, and Rejection
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!If your vanguard is "Mysterious Rain Spiritualist, Zorga", choose three of your units, and they get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Spiritual Body Condensation
effect: Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1]!Choose a card with grade equal to or less than your vanguard from your drop, call it to (RC), and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Rancor Chain
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], draw two cards, choose up to one order card from your hand, discard it, and if you did not discard, choose two cards from your hand, and discard them.[CONT](RC):If you played an order this turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000.

name: Dream Nibbling
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: Vairina Valiente
effect: [overDress]－"Trickstar", or a grade 3 or less unit in the [overDress] state[CONT](RC):This unit gets [Power] +5000 for each of this unit's originalDress. [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When the attack of this unit in the [overDress] state hits, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], and [Stand] this unit.

name: Heavy Artillery of Dust Storm, Eugene
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][[Rest] two rear-guards], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:If your opponent's rear-guard was retired this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 5], look at the same number of cards from the top of your deck as the number of your opponent's open (RC), choose any number of unit cards from among them, call them to (RC), and put the rest into your soul.

name: Master of Gravity, Baromagnes
effect: [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and perform all of the following according to the number of cards in your soul. ・5 or more ‐ Draw a card. ・10 or more ‐ This unit gets [Power] +10000/[Critical] +1 until end of that battle. ・15 or more ‐ Both you and your opponent put all of your own rear-guards into your souls. Choose up to two cards from your soul, call them to (RC), and those units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Diabolos Boys, Eden
effect: [CONT](RC):If you are in "Final Rush", this unit gets [Power] +5000, and if this unit [Stand] this turn by a card effect, [Critical] +1.[AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.

name: Cardinal Deus, Orfist
effect: [CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if your World is Dark Night or Abyssal Dark Night, this unit gets [Power] +5000. [ACT](VC):If your World is Abyssal Dark Night, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], and call up to three Shadow Army tokens to (RC).

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Agra Rouge
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If two or more of your opponent's cards are imprisoned in your Prison, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +10000. [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and imprison it in your Prison.

name: Grand Heavenly Sword, Alden
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 2] &[Soul-Blast 1], choose a card from your hand, and call it to (RC). If you called a grade 3, draw two cards.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have three or more grade 3 units, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Hexaorb Sorceress
effect: [AUTO](VC):When your drive check reveals a trigger unit, choose one of your rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:If you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1] &[Soul-Blast 1], reveal up to one [Critical] trigger or [Front] trigger from your hand and put it on the top of your deck, and this unit gets drive +1 until end of turn.

name: Mysterious Rain Spiritualist, Zorga
effect: [CONT](VC):When you would play a normal order, you can bind a normal order with a different card name from your drop, and Alchemagic.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a card from your drop zone, and call it to (RC).

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Giunosla
effect: [AUTO]Back Row (RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1],choose one of your other rear-guards, and it gets this unit's [Power] until end of turn.

name: Vairina Arcs
effect: [overDress]－"Trickstar"[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if it [overDress], [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw two cards, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Stealth Dragon, Tensha Stead
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack this unit boosted hits, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire this unit], choose one of your vanguards, search your deck for up to one card with the same card name as that card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Dragon Deity King of Resurgence, Dragveda
effect: Additional Effect - Choose one of your vanguards, and [Stand] it!

name: Upward Acrobat, Marjorie
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks, If you are in "Final Rush", [COST][put one of your other rear-guards into your soul], draw a card, [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Steam Battler, Gungnram
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [Soul-Charge 1]. [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 3], and draw a card.

name: Hades Dragon Deity of Resentment, Gallmageheld
effect: Additional Effect - You get "During your turn, all of your vanguards get [Power] +10000/[Critical] +1" until end of this fight!

name: Hyperspeed Robo, Chevalstud
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and imprison it in your Prison. Then, if three or more of your opponent's cards are imprisoned in your Prison, you draw a card.

name: Detonation Monster, Bobalmine
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if your Order Zone has a Set Order, [COST][put this unit into your soul], and [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Star Dragon Deity of Infinitude, Eldobreath
effect: Additional Effect - Double the [Power] and [Critical] of all of your front row units until end of turn!

name: Knight of War Damage, Fosado
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects.[AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, [Counter-Charge 1]/[Soul-Charge 1].

name: Painkiller Angel
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire this unit], and draw a card.

name: Light Dragon Deity of Honors, Amartinoa
effect: Additional Effect - Until end of turn, you also perform drive checks for the battles your rear-guards attack!

name: Inheritance Maiden, Hendrina
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), you may discard three cards from the top of your deck.[ACT](RC):[COST][Retire this unit], and until end of turn, the next time you would Alchemagic an order and play it, you may choose not to pay all of that cost's [Soul-Blast].

name: Spurring Maiden, Ellenia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1] &[Soul-Blast 1], choose a grade 2 or less card from your drop, call it to (RC), and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Source Dragon Deity of Blessings, Blessfavor
effect: Additional Effect - Draw a card! Choose one of your units, and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn! All of your front row units get [Power] +10000! If your damage zone has the same number of cards as your opponent's or more, choose a card from your damage zone, and heal it!
